SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config

Class PkiCredentialConfiguration

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.config.PkiCredentialConfiguration
public class PkiCredentialConfiguration extends Object
A configuration object for configuring PkiCredential objects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PkiCredentialConfiguration()
    Default constructor.
    PkiCredentialConfiguration(String beanReference)
    Constructor setting up the configuration object with a bean reference.
    PkiCredentialConfiguration(PkiCredential cred)
    Constructor setting up the configuration object with a PkiCredential instance.
    PkiCredentialConfiguration(PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties props)
    Constructor setting up the configuration object with a PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties object that is used to create the credential.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PkiCredential
    resolvePkiCredential(BeanLoader beanLoader)
    Given an instantiated configuration object this method resolves it into a PkiCredential object.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • PkiCredentialConfiguration

      public PkiCredentialConfiguration()
      Default constructor.

    • PkiCredentialConfiguration

      public PkiCredentialConfiguration(@Nonnull String beanReference)
      Constructor setting up the configuration object with a bean reference.
      Parameters:
      beanReference - the bean name of the PkiCredential bean to load

    • PkiCredentialConfiguration

      public PkiCredentialConfiguration(@Nonnull PkiCredential cred)
      Constructor setting up the configuration object with a PkiCredential instance.
      Parameters:
      cred - the PkiCredential instance

    • PkiCredentialConfiguration

      public PkiCredentialConfiguration(@Nonnull PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties props)
      Constructor setting up the configuration object with a PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties object that is used to create the credential.
      Parameters:
      props - configuration properties object

  • Method Details

    • resolvePkiCredential

      @Nullable public PkiCredential resolvePkiCredential(@Nullable BeanLoader beanLoader) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Given an instantiated configuration object this method resolves it into a PkiCredential object.
      Parameters:
      beanLoader - the bean loader. If null, resolving of bean references will not be possible
      Returns:
      a PkiCredential object, or null if none has been assigned
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - for configuration errors
